entries: As a group of humanoids, the unit has the following effects:

items: The unit can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the <name> can move through an opening wide enough for a Medium creature. In addition, the unit is immune to spells and magic effects that would alter its size.
While the unit is not {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB}, it has advantage on all saving throws.

If the unit is missing hit points another creature within 5 feet that shares a tag (not counting the Unit tag) with the unit can use its action to merge into the unit, destroying itself and restoring a number of hit points to the swarm equal to five times its CR. For example, a {@creature hoplite (CR 1)|J:Warriors|hoplite} can merge into a {@creature Phalanx (CR 1)|J:Units|phalanx} as they share the Soldier tag.

entries: The <name> makes two weapon attacks. It cannot use this action if it is {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB}.
{@atkr mw} <hit_default>, reach 10 ft. <dmg_strong> slashing or piercing damage.

The <name> moves up to 40 feet in a straight line. Each creature whose space the <name> passes through must make a <dc_default> Strength saving throw or take <dmg_halfcrd12s> bludgeoning damage, or <dmg_halfcrd6s> bludgeoning damage if the <name> is {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB}, and be knocked {@condition Prone|XPHB}. A creature takes half damage and is not knocked prone on a success. A creature that is already prone when it makes the saving throw has disadvantage on the saving throw.
The <name> takes the {@action Dash|XPHB} or {@action Disengage} action.

When the <name> hits a Medium or smaller creature with a melee attack, it can force each Medium or smaller creature within 10 feet of the target to make a <dc_default> Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away from the target.
